name: Guardian of Apep's Oasis
desc:
Wisdom's End: Guardian of Apep's Oasis

Apep found itself swallowed alone amidst the scenery of the catastrophe. All the people, gods, dragons, beasts, birds, and fish. All memories, wisdom, words, and hatred were ground into colorless dust, and the last of the moonlight burned away into a rain of pale fire, falling on the barren land.

...

Apep once deemed the bottom of the sea of sand to be its grave, not the palace of a dispossessed king. The poison of "wisdom" would soon free Apep from the hatred and anger festering within it over countless moons. Apep had grown weary of the colorless apocalypse. Then, finally, the young god and the golden Traveler let it recall once again, even though the verdant land it once ruled had been reduced to this gilded wasteland, even though Apep and its many offspring had grown twisted and wretched to secure their continued survival therein, Apep still treasured the sight and scenes of the oasis sparkling in its heart.

value.name: A Thousand Young
value.desc:
Guardian of Apep's Oasis: A Thousand Young

Apep once walked through an ocean of fragrant grass, gigantic trees, and unimaginably long vines like a fish with its many offspring swimming through the sea. Finally, the grass, trees, and vines withered and turned to dust, while countless beings as minute as grains of gravel built a fragile kingdom upon Apep's land.

Apep and its offspring made the sea of sand rage like boiling water and swept houses down as if they were falling leaves. Until the day when the new Lord of Sand reconciled with the king who lost their homeland, the dunes under the sun belonged to humanity, while the dragon's oasis remained in the hearts of the dragons.

Apep shared the knowledge of evolution with its many offspring, because spreading knowledge ensures dissemination while the stagnation of hoarded wisdom courted only decay. Till the day the promise between it and the Lord of Sand was finally attained, with ultimate wisdom claimed. Henceforth, it reaped only sights of oblivion, of an endless calamity...

value.text: Reward for accepting the Tavern Challenge at The Cat's Tail and claiming victory in a Friendly Fracas with the Guardian of Apep's Oasis

customize.name: Lucky Coin
customize.desc: Currency verified and used by the Genius Invokation TCG Society. Can be used to purchase various items related to Genius Invokation TCG. It is said that these coins were initially named as such in the hopes that they would bring those carrying them luck. However, perhaps it is those who are sufficiently lucky who are able to possess them...

customize.text: Can also be exchanged using a

customize.name: Blank Dynamic Card
customize.desc: A blank card with a painted back. It is said that if you put the name of your desired dynamic card on this blank card, you can get the very skin from the Association agent located at the tavern.

customize.text: Tavern Challenge: Friendly Fracas - Oasis Guardian's Contemplation

<color=#ffd780>Stage Introduction</color>
"Meow..." "Some cats can sense beings of great majesty, keeping an honest and respectful distance. Some even dare not make the slightest noise with their claws so that they may avoid disturbing the other party..."
<color=#ccbfad>Special Rule: This opponent engages in a Duel with you rather than an Adventure Challenge. The Guardian of Apep's Oasis is immune to Frozen, Stun, and Petrification, and starts with the Talent Card "A Thousand Young" equipped. It will also heal itself for 1 HP at the start of every Round and Discard 1 "Awaken, My Kindred" card from its Hand.</color>
<color=#ffffffd9>Opposing Lineup</color>

customize.text: Tavern Challenge: Serious Showdown - Oasis Guardian's Denunciation

<color=#ffd780>Stage Introduction</color>
"Meow!" "A cat who once followed a mercenary told us of a power within the desert that even humans can perceive, an ancient yet reclusive entity. So great was this being's might that our fellow cat felt a deep shock within the depths of the distant sands."
<color=#ccbfad>Special Rule: This opponent engages in a Duel with you rather than an Adventure Challenge. The Guardian of Apep's Oasis is immune to Frozen, Stun, and Petrification, and starts with the Talent Card "A Thousand Young" equipped. At the start of every Round, it will heal itself for 1 HP, discard 1 "Awaken, My Kindred" card from its Hand, and randomly place 1 such card into its deck.</color>
<color=#ffffffd9>Opposing Lineup</color>

customize.name: Guardian of Apep's Oasis

*Has 35 HP
<color=#ffffffd9>Prerequisite</color>
Reach Player Level 9
Complete 3 challenge objective(s) in Oasis Guardian's Contemplation

desc.text:
<color=#ffd780>Elemental Skill</color>
Deals 2 <color=#99ff88>Dendro DMG</color> , draw 1 <color=#ffffff>Awaken, My Kindred</color> card and create 1 stack of <color=#ffffff>Oasis Nourishment</color> .
<color=#ece5d8>Oasis Nourishment</color>
<color=#ffd780>Combat Status</color>
<color=#ffffff>When you play Awaken, My Kindred:</color> Spend 1 less Elemental Die.
<color=#ffffff>U</color> <color=#ffffff>sage(s): 1</color> (Up to 3 stacks)

<color=#ffd780>Elemental Burst</color>
Deals 4 <color=#99ff88>Dendro DMG</color> , draw 1 <color=#ffffff>Awaken, My Kindred</color> card and create 2 stacks of <color=#ffffff>Oasis Nourishment</color> .
<color=#ece5d8>Oasis Nourishment</color>
<color=#ffd780>Combat Status</color>
<color=#ffffff>When you play Awaken, My Kindred:</color> Spend 1 less Elemental Die.
<color=#ffffff>Usage(s): 1</color> (Up to 3 stacks)

<color=#ffd780>Passive Skill</color>
(Passive) When battle begins, create 6 <color=#ffffff>Awaken, My Kindred</color> and place them randomly into your deck. After you summon 4 <color=#ffffff>Proliferated Organism</color> , this character gains <color=#ffffff>Reignited Heart of Oasis</color> and obtains 2 <color=#ffffff>Shield</color> points.
<color=#ece5d8>Reignited Heart of Oasis</color>
<color=#ffd780>Status</color>
The character to which this is attached deals +3 DMG.
<color=#ffffff>After the character to which this is attached uses a Skill:</color> Remove the <color=#ffffff>Oasis Nourishment</color> on your side. Each stack removed heals the attached character for 1 HP.

<color=#ffd780>Event Card</color>
<color=#ffffff>When you play this card or Discard this card:</color> Summon 1 independent Proliferated Organism.

Applies Dendro and can trigger the following Elemental Reactions:
[ <color=#99ff88>Dendro</color> + <color=#80c0ff>Hydro</color> ] <color=#ffffff>Bloom</color> : DMG +1 for this instance, creates a [ <color=#ffffff>Dendro Core</color> ] that greants +2 DMG to the next instance of Pyro or Electro DMG
[ <color=#99ff88>Dendro</color> + <color=#ff9999>Pyro</color> ] <color=#ffffff>Burning</color> : DMG +1 for this instance, creates a [ <color=#ffffff>Burning Flame</color> ] that will deal 1 Pyro DMG at the end of the Round (Takes effect once, max 2 stacks)
[ <color=#99ff88>Dendro</color> + <color=#ffacff>Electro</color> ] <color=#ffffff>Quicken</color> : DMG +1 for this instance, creates a [ <color=#ffffff>Catalyzing Field</color> ] that grants +1 DMG to the next 2 instances of Dendro or Electro DMG

<color=#ece5d8>Physical DMG</color>
Physical DMG will not apply any Elements, nor can it engage in Elemental Reactions.
<color=#ece5d8>Discard</color>
Use Action Cards or Character Skill effects to Discard Action Cards from Hand or Deck.
<color=#ece5d8>Usage(s)</color>
After this card's effect is triggered, 1 <color=#ffffff>Usage</color> of it will be consumed.
This card will be discarded immediately once it has 0 <color=#ffffff>Usages</color> remaining.
<color=#ece5d8>Shield</color>
This Shield will be consumed to protect the character who equips it from DMG.
